org.openstack4j.model.senlin.builder

Interface ClusterActionCreateBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Buildable.Builder<ClusterActionCreateBuilder,ClusterActionCreate>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SenlinClusterActionCreate.SenlinClusterActionCreateConcreteBuilder

    public interface ClusterActionCreateBuilder
extends Buildable.Builder<ClusterActionCreateBuilder,ClusterActionCreate>
    This interface describes a builder for ClusterActionCreate objects
    Author:
    lion
